title_page.title: Chartered Institute Of Transport Of Sri Lanka (Incorporation) (Amendment) Act

preamble: A N   A Ct   To   Amend   The  C Hartered  I Nstitute   Of  T Ransport   Of S Ri  L Anka  (I Ncorporation ) A Ct , N O . 8  Of  2000
Be It  Enacted By The Parliament Of The Democratic Socialist Republic Of Sri Lanka As Follows :

pre_section_list.text: This Act may be cited as the Chartered Institute of Transport of Sri Lanka (Incorporation) (Amendment) Act, No. 18 of  2023.

The long title to the Chartered Institute of Transport of Sri Lanka (Incorporation) Act, No. 8 of 2000, (hereinafter referred to as the principal enactment) is hereby amended by the substitution, for the words Chartered Institute of Transport of Sri Lanka. of the words Chartered Institute of Logistics and Transport of Sri Lanka
pre_block_list: Amendment of long title to the Act, No. 8 of 2000

child_level_list.text: In the principal enactment and in any other written law there shall be substituted for the words Chartered Institute of  Transport of Sri Lanka wherever such words appear in the principal enactment and such other written law of the words Chartered Institute of Logistics and Transport of Sri Lanka.
pre_block_list: General amendment to the principal enactment and other written law

child_level_list.text: Every reference to the Chartered Institute of  Transport of Sri Lanka in any notice, notification, contract, communication or other document shall be read and construed as a reference   to the   Chartered Institute of Logistics and Transport of Sri Lanka.

pre_section_list.text: For the avoidance of doubts it is hereby declared that the Chartered Institute of Logistics and Transport of Sri Lanka shall for all purposes be deemed to be the successor to the Chartered Institute of Transport of Sri Lanka.
pre_block_list: Sinhala text to prevail in case of inconsistency

pre_section_list.text: In the event of any inconsistency between the Sinhala and Tamil texts of this Act, the Sinhala text shall prevail.
